1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 """
3 This code serves as the generic RobotController
4 class.
5 """
6 
7 import rospy
8 import numpy as np
9 import intera_interface
10 from RobotArm import RobotArm
11 
12 
13 class RobotController(object):
14  """
15  Robot controller object.
16  """
17  def __init__(self, num_joints, is_sim=True,
18  controller_names=None):
19  """
20  robot controller for n joints.
21  """
22  self.is_sim = is_sim
23  self.arm = self.get_arm(num_joints, is_sim)
24  self.sleep_time_static = rospy.get_param('/static_sleep_time')
25  self.r = rospy.Rate(rospy.get_param('/dynamic_frequency'))
26  self.pose_name = ''
27 
28  def get_arm(self, num_joints, is_sim=True):
29  """
30  gets the robotic limb.
31  """
32  return RobotArm(num_joints=num_joints, is_sim=is_sim)
33 
34  @property
35  def joint_names(self):
36  """
37  get joint names.
38  """
39  return self.arm.joint_names()
40 
41  @property
42  def joint_velocities(self):
43  """
44  get joint velocities.
45  """
46  return self.arm.joint_velocities()
47 
48  @property
49  def joint_angles(self):
50  """
51  get joint angles.
52  """
53  return self.arm.joint_angles()
54 
55  def joint_angle(self, joint_name):
56  """
57  get joint angle givem `joint_name`.
58  """
59  return self.arm.joint_angle(joint_name)
60 
61  def joint_velocity(self, joint_name):
62  """
63  get joint velocity given `joint_name`.
64  """
65  return self.arm.joint_velocity(joint_name)
66 
67  def set_joint_position_speed(self, speed=1.0):
68  """
69  change joint position speed.
70  """
71  return self.arm.set_joint_position_speed(speed)
72 
73  def send_once(self):
74  """
75  sends a trajectory message once.
76  """
77  traj = np.zeros((1, 3, 7))
78  self.arm.set_joint_trajectory(traj)
79  rospy.sleep(1)
80  self.arm.set_joint_trajectory(traj)
81  rospy.sleep(1)
82 
83  def publish_positions(self, joint_positions, sleep=2.0):
84  """
85  moves robot to specificed `joint_positions`.
86  """
87  self.arm.move_to_joint_positions(joint_positions, sleep)
88 
89  def send_velocities(self, joint_velocities):
90  """
91  sends a velocity command. no sleep, none of that.
92  """
93  self.arm.set_joint_velocities(joint_velocities)
94 
95  def publish_velocities(self, joint_velocities, sleep=2.0):
96  """
97  unlike `send_velocities`, this function will
98  command joints to move at specified velocities for `sleep`
99  seconds before stopping.
100  """
101  self.arm.set_joint_velocities(joint_velocities)
102  rospy.sleep(sleep)
103  self.arm.set_joint_velocities(np.zeros(self.arm.num_joints))
104 
105  def publish_trajectory(self, positions, velocities, accelerations, sleep):
106  """
107  publishes a robot trajectory. Takes care of positions, velocities,
108  and accelerations, which are more intuitive than a 3-d tensor.
109  """
110  # shape is amount of poses, 3 rows for pos,vel,acc, with num_joints
111  traj = np.zeros((len(positions), 3, self.arm.num_joints))
112  for idx, (pos, vel, acc) in enumerate(zip(positions, velocities, accelerations)):
113  traj[idx] = np.vstack((pos, vel, acc))
114  self.arm.set_joint_trajectory(traj)
115  rospy.sleep(sleep)
116 
117  def set_positions_list(self, poses, sleep):
118  """
119  sets position list.
120  """
121  for each_pose in poses:
122  positions, _, pose_name = each_pose[0], each_pose[1], each_pose[2] # noqa: F841
123  self.pose_name = pose_name
124  self.publish_positions(positions, sleep)
125 
126  def set_velocities_list(self, poses, sleep):
127  """
128  sets velocities in a list
129  """
130  for each_pose in poses:
131  _, velocities, pose_name = each_pose[0], each_pose[1], each_pose[2] # noqa: F841
132  self.pose_name = pose_name
133  self.publish_velocities(velocities, sleep)
134 
135  def set_trajectory_list(self, poses, sleep):
136  """
137  sets trajectories from values provided in list.
138  """
139  for each_pose in poses:
140  positions, velocities, pose_name = each_pose[0], each_pose[1], each_pose[2]
141  accelerations = np.zeros(7)
142  self.pose_name = pose_name
143  self.publish_trajectory(positions, velocities, accelerations, sleep)
144 
145 
146 class PandaController(RobotController):
147  """
148  PandaController class
149  """
150  def __init__(self, num_joints=7, is_sim=True):
151  super(PandaController, self).__init__(num_joints, is_sim)
152 
153 
154 class SawyerController(RobotController):
155  """
156  SawyerController class.
157  """
158  def __init__(self, num_joints=7, is_sim=True, limb_name="right"):
159  self.limb_name = limb_name
160  super(SawyerController, self).__init__(num_joints, is_sim)
161  self.positions = {name: 0.0 for name in self.joint_names}
162  self.velocities = {name: 0.0 for name in self.joint_names}
163 
164  def get_arm(self, num_joints, is_sim=True):
165  arm = intera_interface.Limb(self.limb_name)
166  self._rs = intera_interface.RobotEnable(intera_interface.CHECK_VERSION)
167  self._init_state = self._rs.state().enabled
168  self._rs.enable()
169  self.num_joints = num_joints
170  rospy.sleep(2)
171  return arm
172 
173  def send_once(self):
174  """
175  sends a trajectory message once.
176  """
177  positions = [0] * self.num_joints
178  velocities = [0] * self.num_joints
179  accelerations = [0] * self.num_joints
180 
181  self.arm.set_joint_trajectory(self.joint_names(), positions, velocities, accelerations)
182 
183  def update_position_vec(self, positions):
184  for joint_name, position in zip(self.joint_names, positions):
185  self.positions[joint_name] = float(position)
186 
187  def update_velocity_vec(self, velocities):
188  for joint_name, velocity in zip(self.joint_names, velocities):
189  self.velocities[joint_name] = float(velocity)
190 
191  def publish_positions(self, joint_positions, sleep=2.0):
192  """
193  moves robot to specified `joint_positions`.
194  """
195  self.update_position_vec(joint_positions)
196  self.arm.move_to_joint_positions(self.positions, sleep)
197 
198  def send_velocities(self, joint_velocities):
199  """
200  sends a velocity command. no sleep, none of that.
201  """
202  self.update_velocity_vec(joint_velocities)
203  self.arm.set_joint_velocities(self.velocities)
204 
205  def publish_velocities(self, joint_velocities, sleep=2.0):
206  """
207  unlike `send_velocities`, this function will
208  command joints to move at specified velocities for `sleep`
209  seconds before stopping.
210  """
211  self.update_velocity_vec(joint_velocities)
212 
213  self.arm.set_joint_velocities(self.velocities)
214  self.update_velocity_vec(joint_velocities)
215 
216  rospy.sleep(sleep)
217  self.update_velocity_vec(np.zeros(self.num_joints))
218  self.arm.set_joint_velocities(self.velocities)
219 
220  def publish_trajectory(self, positions, velocities, accelerations, sleep=2.0):
221  """
222  publishes a robot trajectory. Takes care of positions, velocities,
223  and accelerations, which are more intuitive than a 3-d tensor.
224  """
225  # shape is amount of poses, 3 rows for pos,vel,acc, with num_joints
226  self.arm.set_joint_trajectory(self.joint_names, positions, velocities, accelerations)
227  rospy.sleep(sleep)
228 
229 
230 if __name__ == '__main__':
231  """
232  this is a simple example of creating a panda controller
233  and publishing positions to all of the joints.
234  """
235  rospy.init_node('robot_controller', anonymous=True)
236  controller = PandaController()
237 
238  controller.publish_positions([1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1])
